name: Slaves to Armok 2: Dwarf Fortress
description:
Slaves to Armok 2: Dwarf Fortress is an action-RPG game developed by Bay 12 Games. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Bay 12 Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Slaves to Armok 2: Dwarf Fortress is available on PC and Classic Macintosh.
